name: Light in the end of the tunnel
name_original: Light in the end of the tunnel
description:
What lies in the shadows of memory? Only moments you choose to remember.

All ups and downs of simple guy's life will come to light in this small puzzled experience.

Controls: Keyboard

Play time: 2-6 minutes

Made by mrBell270

GitHub link: https://github.com/mrbell270/GameOff2022

Entry for Game Off 2022 (https://itch.io/jam/game-off-2022)

Theme: cliché

Chosen sub-theme: light in the end of the tunnel and other idioms.
